generated_text:
- road: The paved surface where vehicles and pedestrians are present, extending from the foreground into the distance.
- sidewalk: The paved area on the right side of the road, adjacent to the white fence, where pedestrians can walk.
- building: The multi-story structures lining the street, including the pink and beige buildings on the left and the white container-like structure on the right.
- fence: The white metal fence running along the right side of the street.
- pole: The vertical poles supporting the traffic sign and possibly other fixtures.
- traffic sign: The sign mounted on a pole, indicating a speed limit of 20 km/h.
- vegetation: The trees and greenery visible in the background and along the sides of the street.
- terrain: The small patch of grass visible in the foreground near the curb.
- sky: The visible portion of the sky above the buildings and trees.
- person: The individual walking on the road, carrying a bag.
- rider: The person riding a bicycle in the middle of the road.
- car: The silver car parked on the right side of the street and the various cars parked along the left side.
- truck: The white container-like structure on the right side of the street, which appears to be a truck or trailer.
